Saradomin's blessed sword is a two-handed sword which requires 75 Attack to wield. It is created by combining Saradomin's tear with the Saradomin sword. The blessed sword has +18 Slash and +6 Strength more than the normal variant.

If the sword is not protected upon death, it will fully degrade into Saradomin's tear. However, if it is protected on death, it will remain in its regular state as Saradomin's blessed sword.

Degradation[edit | edit source]

A player performing the Saradomin's blessed sword's special attack, Saradomin's Lightning.

Saradomin's blessed sword degrades as it is used. After 10,000 hits with the weapon (400 minutes of continuous combat), it will degrade and consume the Saradomin sword, leaving the player with Saradomin's tear.

When using the items on each other there will be a warning message that states A blessed Saradomin sword is untradeable, with an Attack requirement of 75. After 10,000 hits, the sword crumbles to dust, and you get the Tear back. Each hit costs 28.47, costing 42,700.8 per hour of constant use.

Special attack[edit | edit source]

Saradomin's blessed sword has a special attack, Saradomin's Lightning, which deals a Magic-based attack (Magical melee) that increases the player's max hit by 25%, consuming 65% of the player's special attack energy.

The special attack rolls against the opponent's Magic defence bonus while using the player's slash attack bonus, making this special attack extremely accurate on melee armour. Under perfect conditions, the special attack can hit up to 72. Despite being Magic-based, it will still inflict damage on Cyclops in the Warriors' Guild and Callisto, Venenatis and Vet'ion.

[[File:Saradomin's blessed sword detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Saradomin's blessed sword''' is a [[two-handed sword]] which requires 75 [[Attack]] to wield. It is created by combining [[Saradomin's tear]] with the [[Saradomin sword]]. The blessed sword has +18 Slash and +6 Strength more than the normal variant.

If the sword is '''not''' protected upon death, it will fully degrade into [[Saradomin's tear]]. However, if it is protected on death, it will remain in its regular state as Saradomin's blessed sword.

==Degradation==
[[File:Saradomin's Blessed Lightning.gif|thumb|200px|A player performing the Saradomin's blessed sword's special attack, ''Saradomin's Lightning''.]]
Saradomin's blessed sword degrades as it is used. After 10,000 hits with the weapon (400 minutes of continuous combat), it will degrade and consume the Saradomin sword, leaving the player with Saradomin's tear.

When using the items on each other there will be a warning message that states ''A blessed Saradomin sword is untradeable, with an Attack requirement of 75. After 10,000 hits, the sword crumbles to dust, and you get the Tear back.'' Each hit costs {{Coins|{{GEP|Saradomin sword}} * 0.0001}}, costing {{Coins|{{GEP|Saradomin sword}} * 0.15}} per hour of constant use.

==Special attack==
Saradomin's blessed sword has a [[special attack]], ''Saradomin's Lightning'', which deals a [[Magic]]-based attack ([[Magical melee]]) that increases the player's max hit by 25%, consuming 65% of the player's special attack energy.

The special attack rolls against the opponent's Magic defence bonus while using the player's slash attack bonus, making this special attack extremely accurate on melee armour. Under perfect conditions, the special attack can hit up to 72. Despite being Magic-based, it will still inflict damage on [[Cyclops]] in the [[Warriors' Guild]] and [[Callisto]], [[Venenatis]] and [[Vet'ion]].
